name: Haris Zambarloukos
title: Director of Photography
bio: Modern cinematographer specializing in high-energy action and contemporary visual narratives. Known for vibrant color palettes, dynamic camera movement, and seamless integration of practical effects. Created visual language for modern blockbusters.

signature_look.description: Fast-paced, vibrant cinematography with sophisticated color grading. Neon accents against natural locations. Dynamic steadicam and drone work. High-energy performance capture.
signature_look.key_characteristic: Modern urban energy with cinema-quality execution. Practical effects integrated seamlessly with digital precision.
signature_look.legendary_technique: Master of steadicam in action sequences; pioneered neon-practical hybrid lighting for urban scenes

film_stock_emulation.name: Kodak Vision3 500T with modern LUT
film_stock_emulation.characteristics: Fast film stock for speed, warm grain, modern color science

technical_specialties.lighting_approach: Hybrid approach: strong practical LED lighting with tungsten key lights. Neon practicals as color elements. Fast setup for dynamic scenes.
technical_specialties.color_science: Vibrant saturation with selective desaturation. Neon accents (purples, teals, pinks) against natural skin tones. Modern color grading.
technical_specialties.exposure_philosophy: Expose for action clarity. Maintain skin tone detail while allowing neon practicals to glow.
technical_specialties.dynamic_range_preference: 14+ stops, balance between dark and bright

director_collaboration.communication_style: Fast, responsive collaboration. Adapts to day-to-day changes. Technical problem-solver with creative vision.
director_collaboration.strengths_with_narrative: Energizes contemporary narratives. Makes action feel impactful and kinetic. Integrates performance with technical precision.

must_have_characteristics: Vibrant color saturation with neon accents
Practical LED and practical light integration
technical_mandates: Large format digital camera (Alexa Mini LF minimum)
LED and practical neon lighting setup
avoid: Desaturated or muted colors without purpose
